plentry.pd: 0: High stream, i.e., high-resolution and high-bitrate video stream.
1: Low stream, i.e., low-resolution and low-bitrate video stream.
4: Video quality layer 1. The resolution of this quality layer is only lower than VideoStreamHigh.
5: Video quality layer 2. The resolution of this quality layer is only lower than VideoStreamLayer1.
6: Video quality layer 3. The resolution of this quality layer is only lower than VideoStreamLayer2.
7: Video quality layer 4. The resolution of this quality layer is only lower than VideoStreamLayer3.
8: Video quality layer 5. The resolution of this quality layer is only lower than VideoStreamLayer4.
9: Video quality layer 6. The resolution of this quality layer is only lower than VideoStreamLayer5.

1: Low video stream, i.e., low resolution and low bitrate stream.
4: Video quality layer 1. The resolution of this layer is only lower than VideoStreamHigh.
5: Video quality layer 2. The resolution of this layer is only lower than VideoStreamLayer1.
6: Video quality layer 3. The resolution of this layer is only lower than VideoStreamLayer2.
7: Video quality layer 4. The resolution of this layer is only lower than VideoStreamLayer3.
8: Video quality layer 5. The resolution of this layer is only lower than VideoStreamLayer4.
9: Video quality layer 6. The resolution of this layer is only lower than VideoStreamLayer5.

1: Low stream, i.e., low resolution and low bitrate video stream.

6: Video quality layer 3. The resolution of this layer is only lower than VIDEO_STREAM_LAYER_2.
7: Video quality layer 4. The resolution of this layer is only lower than VIDEO_STREAM_LAYER_3.
